extendedInfo.description: View and compare Indian Rupee exchange rates for US Dollar, Pound, Euro, Singapore Dollar or Australian Dollar from well known financial institutions like Axis Bank, HDFC, ICICI, Remit2India, SBI and others..++[ FEATURES ]++.* View exchange rates by financial institution* View exchange rates from all supported financial institutions for any amount of your choice* View a trend chart of exchange rates* Best rate is marked with a star* Switch between US Dollar, Pound, Euro, Singapore Dollar and Australian Dollar exchange rates* No accounts to create and always free.++[ FEEDBACK AND SUGGESTIONS ]++.Reach out to us directly at feedback@2inr.com.++[ FOLLOW US ]++.On Twitter: @2INR.++[ SUPPORT ]++.For support, contact us at support@2inr.com.* This application requires an active internet connection to work.* Please click on refresh button to reload the values.* For desktop version and more information, please visit http://www.2inr.com.* Read our service disclaimer at http://www.2inr.com/disclaimer..Keywords : dollar2rupee pound2rupee 2inr us singapore australia dollar uk pound euro indian rupee usd gbp sgd aud eur inr exchange conversion convert forex remit transfer rates rate dollars pounds rupees usa america nri sbi remit2india icici hdfc axis bank xoom

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: App meeting my 90% requirements. Few suggestions though, the defaut tab and the graph legend colours should be configurable. A widget would be more useful though.
reviews.author: venkat pailla

reviews.title: Best App
reviews.comment: Wow... best app to know the rates as far i know.... can see all the top services how much they offer current rate to rupees. I would recommend if you send money to India a lot and want to send at great rate.
reviews.author: Zahin Tailor

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome app. It gives a good way of finding the rates and I find it highly useful. The ability to turn on/off certain banks in the graph view is excellent. I wish to see a notification feature whenever the rate is updated, but can live without it. :)
reviews.author: Sreejith K

reviews.title: Nice after update
reviews.comment: Liked the graphs, kinda slow though!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app never imagined there would be beautiful app like this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect app!!!
reviews.comment: Perfect app to know the current currency rates.  It\'s very accurate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Very good app show consolidated rates...
reviews.author: Prasad Boorla

reviews.title: As SBI removed only one star
reviews.comment: Add SBI back to get 5 stars
reviews.author: Suneel Makkuva

reviews.title: Battery hog
reviews.comment: Opened the app once. Ate 6% battery .... equivalent to 18 minutes on screen time. Would give zero stars if possible. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: An excellent app to check the exchange rates of different websites

reviews.title: Insanely awesome
reviews.comment: This is one of the best apps I have. Quickly tells you the exchange rates offered by different send money India providers. Difference by few cents don\'t matter but it does when you need to send a fixed amount and all these cheater banks.
